posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
19th century Items for sale.  First to e mail gets them.

1876 Yale University Imperial Cabinet Photo in Full Uniform 11.5 X 15.5 inches.  $995.

1887 Old Judge Fullmer & Tucker Baltimore.  Rare Horizontal Baltimore card.  Ex+ and RARE.  Lists in the Price Guides at $3150, price is $1000.

1887 N28 Allen & Ginter Bob Caruthers.  100% Authentic, has some staining on the front but great corners and will grade.  $125.

I will be listing more items in different categories tonight as well before anything hits ebay.

themodo@hotmail.com
